replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry about that :(

The good news is you can get the name you want without issues, just follow the steps below.

* Create the club with a temporary name (Whatever you want)
* [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support asking for the clubs name to be changed, dont forget to include the current club name and what you want the new name to be (Explain that the new name was flagged as "not allowed" by the client)
* Play the waiting game, support is currently backed up with requests however should get to you within at most 48 hours.
